titleStmt.title: A true representation of the proceedings of the kingdome of Scotland; since the late pacification: by the estates of the kingdome: against mistakings in the late declaration, 1640
titleStmt.author: Lothian, William Kerr, Earl of, 1605?-1675.
Church of Scotland. General Assembly.
Scotland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: By William Kerr, Earl of Lothian.
A reply to: Balcanquhall, Walter. A large declaration concerning the late tumults in Scotland, from their first originalls.
Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
"The proceedings of the Commissioners sent from the Parliament of Scotland: to the King" (caption title) has separate pagination and register.
"Proceedings" also identified as STC 21927 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
